dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1754 IH: To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to clarify the scope of the exception for common carriers.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Latta (for himself and Mr. Olson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to clarify the scope of the exception for common carriers.

section.header: Clarification of scope of common carrier exception
section.text: The Federal Trade Commission Act (15 U.S.C. 41 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 5(a)(2), by inserting insofar as they are after common carriers; and

subparagraph.text: by inserting insofar as they are after common carriers each place it appears; and
by inserting insofar as it is after common carrier each place it appears.
